prompt.compare_property.question: Which element has a higher {property}: {elementA} or {elementB}?

prompt.order_by_property.question: Arrange the elements {elements} in {order} order of {property}.

prompt.determine_oxidation_state.question: Determine the oxidation state of {element} in {formula}.

prompt.compose_salt.question: What is the formula of the salt formed from ions {cation} and {anion}?

prompt.solubility_of_salt.question: Is the salt {salt_formula} soluble in water?

prompt.identify_bond_type.question: Identify the type of chemical bond in {formula}.

prompt.compare_melting_points.question: Which substance has a higher melting point: {formulaA} or {formulaB}?

prompt.max_oxidation_state.question: What is the maximum typical oxidation state of {element}?

prompt.find_period.question: In which period is the element {element}?

prompt.find_group.question: In which group is the element {element}?

prompt.select_electron_config.question: What is the electron configuration of {element}?

prompt.count_valence.question: How many valence electrons does {element} have?

prompt.element_from_config.question: Which element has the electron configuration {config}?

prompt.predict_crystal_property.question: Which physical properties are characteristic of substances with a {crystal_type} crystal structure?

prompt.bond_from_delta_chi.question: Determine the bond type in the compound formed by {elementA} and {elementB} based on electronegativity difference.

prompt.select_compound_by_state.question: In which compound does {element} have an oxidation state of {expected_state}?

prompt.min_oxidation_state.question: What is the minimum typical oxidation state of {element}?

prompt.classify_subclass.question: Classify the subclass of the substance {formula}.

prompt.identify_class_by_desc.question: Which class of inorganic substances matches this description: {description}?

prompt.formula_to_name.question: What is the name of the substance {formula}?

prompt.name_to_formula.question: Write the formula of the substance "{name}".

prompt.amphoteric_reaction_partner.question: The substance {formula} is amphoteric. With which types of substances can it react?

prompt.naming_rule_template.question: Which naming rule applies to the substance {formula}?

prompt.predict_exchange_products.question: Predict the products of the exchange reaction: {equation}

prompt.identify_driving_force.question: What is the driving force of the reaction: {equation}?

prompt.activity_series_compare.question: Can {metalA} displace {metalB} from a salt solution?

prompt.will_metal_react.question: Will {metalA} react with dilute acid (release H₂)?

prompt.match_ionic_equation.question: Match the molecular equation to its net ionic form.

prompt.identify_spectator_ions.question: Identify the spectator ions in the reaction: {equation}

prompt.identify_reagent_for_ion.question: What reagent is used to detect the ion {target_name}?

prompt.identify_ion_by_obs.question: Which ion is detected by the observation: {observation}?

prompt.complete_chain_step.question: Complete the missing substance in the chain: {chain_substances}

prompt.choose_reagent_for_step.question: What reagent is needed for the step: {substance} → ?

prompt.identify_oxidizer_reducer.question: Identify the oxidizing agent in the reaction: {equation}

prompt.predict_substitution.question: Predict the products of the substitution reaction: {equation}

prompt.factors_affecting_rate.question: Which factor affects the reaction rate?

prompt.exo_endo_classify.question: Is the reaction exothermic or endothermic: {equation}?

prompt.equilibrium_shift.question: How will the equilibrium shift if {eq_factor} changes?

prompt.catalyst_properties.question: What catalyst is used for the reaction: {catalyst_reaction}?

prompt.identify_catalyst.question: Identify the catalyst for the given reaction.

prompt.calc_mass_fraction.question: Calculate the mass fraction of {element} in {formula}.

prompt.calc_amount.question: Calculate the amount of substance (mol) for {mass} g of {formula}.

prompt.calc_mass_from_moles.question: Calculate the mass of {amount} mol of {formula}.

prompt.calc_concentration.question: Calculate the mass fraction if {m_solute} g of solute is dissolved in {m_solution} g of solution.

prompt.calc_solute_mass.question: Calculate the mass of solute needed for {m_solution} g of {omega}% solution.

prompt.calc_dilution.question: How much solution is needed to dilute {m_solution} g of {omega}% solution to {omega_target}%?

prompt.calc_by_equation.question: Calculate the mass of {find_formula} from {given_mass} g of {given_formula}. Equation: {equation}

prompt.calc_yield.question: Calculate the practical yield of {find_formula} from {given_mass} g of {given_formula} at {yield_percent}% yield.
